user.title: Google Find My Device Authentication
user.description: Choose your authentication method. Method 1 is recommended if you can run GoogleFindMyTools on a computer with Chrome.

secrets_json.title: Method 1: GoogleFindMyTools secrets.json
secrets_json.description: Run GoogleFindMyTools on a machine with Chrome to generate authentication tokens, then paste the complete contents of the Auth/secrets.json file below.

individual_tokens.title: Method 2: Individual OAuth Token
individual_tokens.description: Enter your OAuth token and Google email address obtained from a manual authentication process.

error.invalid_token: Invalid token provided or missing required fields.
error.invalid_json: Invalid JSON format in secrets.json content.
error.no_devices: No devices found. Please ensure you have Find My Device enabled on your Google account.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Google API. This may be a temporary issue - please try again.

abort.already_configured: Google Find My Device is already configured.
abort.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Google Find My Device.

init.title: Configure Google Find My Device
init.description:
Configuring account: {account_email}

To add another account, use '+ Add Integration' from the Integrations page.

data_description.map_view_token_expiration: When enabled, map view tokens expire after 1 week. When disabled (default), tokens do not expire.

credentials.title: Update Credentials for {account_email}
credentials.description:
⚠️ This will update credentials for the current account only.

To add a different account, cancel this and use '+ Add Integration' from the Integrations page instead.
